OOC: If any othe decepticons are in the base, wouldn't they find a 
complete stranger walking around kinda wierd?

BIC:

Ragnus dragged Perceptor behind him as he made his way to the CR 
chambers.  Ally or hoststage, this 'bot needed some repairs.  Upon 
arriving at the area in which the chamers were, he placed Perceptor 
in one then activated it.

If he were a hostage, dammaged goods wouldn't be tactically sound.
